name: Breast Cancer Pathway: Early Stage HER2+ Pathway
description: Pathway for the Early Stage HER2+ Initial Medical Consult Breast Cancer Pathway

criteria.cql: "Primary Cancer Condition" PrimaryCancer return Tuple{ value: PrimaryCancer.code.text.value, match: PrimaryCancer.code.text.value ~ 'Malignant neoplasm of breast (disorder)' }

condition.cql: [Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] N0 where ToConcept(N0.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "N0 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: N0.id.value , status: N0.status.value}

[Observation: "Regional lymph nodes.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] NLarge let NLargeConcept: ToConcept(NLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where NLargeConcept ~ "N1 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N2 category (finding)" or NLargeConcept ~ "N3 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: NLarge.id.value , status: NLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Primary tumor.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] TLarge let TLageConcept: ToConcept(TLarge.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) where TLageConcept ~ "T2 category (finding)" or TLageConcept ~ "T3 category (finding)" or TLageConcept ~ "T4 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: TLarge.id.value , status: TLarge.status.value}

[Observation: "Primary tumor.clinical [Class] Cancer code"] TSmall where ToConcept(TSmall.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "T0 category (finding)" or ToConcept(TSmall.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "T1 category (finding)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: TSmall.id.value , status: TSmall.status.value}

ChemotherapyTHWeekly.label: Chemotherapy TH Weekly
ChemotherapyTHWeekly.cql: [Procedure: "Chemotherapy (procedure) code"] Chemo return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Procedure', id: Chemo.id.value , status: Chemo.status.value}

ChemotherapyTCHAC+TH.label: Chemotherapy TCH AC + TH
ChemotherapyTCHAC+TH.cql: [Procedure: "Chemotherapy (procedure) code"] Chemo return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Procedure', id: Chemo.id.value , status: Chemo.status.value}

PostchemotherapyTrastuzumabRequest.label: Post-Chemotherapy Trastuzumab Request

action.description: Post Chemotherapy Trastuzumab (1 year total duration recommended)

PostchemotherapyTrastuzumabRequest.cql: [MedicationRequest: "trastuzumab code"] PCT return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: PCT.id.value , status: PCT.status.value}

PostchemotherapyTrastuzumabAdministratio.label: Post-Chemotherapy Trastuzumab Administration

action.description: Post Chemotherapy Trastuzumab (1 year total duration recommended)

PostchemotherapyTrastuzumabAdministratio.cql: [MedicationAdministration: "trastuzumab code"] Trastuzumab return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationAdministration', id: Trastuzumab.id.value, status: Trastuzumab.status.value}

condition.cql: [Observation: "Estrogen receptor Ag [Presence] in Breast cancer specimen by Immune stain code"] Neg where ToConcept(Neg.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Negative (qualifier value)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: Neg.id.value , status: Neg.status.value}

[Observation: "Estrogen receptor Ag [Presence] in Breast cancer specimen by Immune stain code"] Pos where ToConcept(Pos.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Positive (qualifier value)" return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: Pos.id.value , status: Pos.status.value}

(if exists [Observation: "Age at menopause code"] then [Observation: "Age at menopause code"] else [Observation] Men2 where ToConcept(Men2.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Menopause present (finding)") Men return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: Men.id.value, status: Men.status.value }

[Observation: "missing loinc code"] PreMen where ToConcept(PreMen.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Menopause absent (finding)" return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: PreMen.id.value, status: PreMen.status.value }

[Observation: "Menses finding code"] Menses let MensesDate: (Menses.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value with [Procedure: "Chemotherapy (procedure) code"] Chemo such that ToConcept(Menses.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Secondary amenorrhea (finding)" and (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value before MensesDate and MensesDate within 15 months of (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value with [Patient] P such that MensesDate after ((convert P.birthDate.value to DateTime) + 35 years) or MensesDate same as ((convert P.birthDate.value to DateTime) + 35 years) return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: Menses.id.value, status: Menses.status.value }

[Observation: "Menses finding code"] Menses let MensesDate: (Menses.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value with [Procedure: "Chemotherapy (procedure) code"] Chemo such that ToConcept(Menses.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Secondary amenorrhea (finding)" and (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value before MensesDate and MensesDate within 15 months of (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value with [Patient] P such that MensesDate within 35 years of (convert P.birthDate.value to DateTime) return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: Menses.id.value, status: Menses.status.value }

[Observation: "Menses finding code"] Menses let MensesDate: (Menses.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value with [Procedure: "Chemotherapy (procedure) code"] Chemo such that ToConcept(Menses.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Menstruation, function (observable entity)" and (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value before MensesDate and MensesDate within 15 months of (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: Menses.id.value, status: Menses.status.value }

if not exists ([Observation: "missing loinc code"] Estradiol where ToConcept(Estradiol.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Abnormal estradiol (finding)") then [Observation] E return Tuple { resourceType: 'No Estradiol Resource', status: 'final' } else {}

[Observation] Estradiol let EstradiolDate: (Estradiol.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value with [MedicationAdministration: "tamoxifen code"] Tamoxifen such that ToConcept(Estradiol.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Abnormal estradiol (finding)" and EstradiolDate within 8 months of (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value return Tuple{ resourceType: 'Observation', id: Estradiol.id.value, status: Estradiol.status.value }
[Procedure: "Oophorectomy (procedure) code"] Oophorectomy return Tuple { resourceType: 'Procedure', id: Oophorectomy.id.value, status: Oophorectomy.status.value }
[MedicationRequest: "Lupron code"] Lupron return Tuple { resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: Lupron.id.value, status: Lupron.status.value }

Oophorectomy.label: Oophorectomy (procedure)
Oophorectomy.cql: [Procedure: "Oophorectomy (procedure) code"] Oophorectomy return Tuple { resourceType: 'Procedure', id: Oophorectomy.id.value, status: Oophorectomy.status.value }

LupronRequest.label: Lupron Medication Request

action.description: Begin Ovarian Ablation with Lupron Request

LupronRequest.cql: [MedicationRequest: "Lupron code"] Lupron return Tuple { resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: Lupron.id.value, status: Lupron.status.value }

LupronAdministration.label: Lupron Medication Administration
LupronAdministration.cql: [MedicationAdministration: "Lupron code"] Lupron return Tuple { resourceType: 'MedicationAdministration', id: Lupron.id.value, status: Lupron.status.value }

StartTamoxifen.label: Start Tamoxifen
StartTamoxifen.cql: [MedicationRequest: "tamoxifen code"] Tamoxifen with [Procedure: "Chemotherapy (procedure) code"] Chemo such that (Tamoxifen.authoredOn as FHIR.dateTime).value within 15 months of (Chemo.performed.end as FHIR.dateTime).value return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: Tamoxifen.id.value, status: Tamoxifen.status.value }

Tamoxifen5YearsTotal.label: Tamoxifen 5 Years Total
Tamoxifen5YearsTotal.cql: [MedicationAdministration: "tamoxifen code"] Tamoxifen where years between (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value and Now() > 5 return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationAdministration', id: Tamoxifen.id.value, status: Tamoxifen.status.value }

condition.description: No Menses within 1 Year of Tamoxifen
condition.cql: [Observation: "Menses finding code"] Menses let MensesDate: (Menses.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value with [MedicationAdministration: "tamoxifen code"] Tamoxifen such that ToConcept(Menses.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Secondary amenorrhea (finding)" and MensesDate after (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value and MensesDate within 6 years of (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: Menses.id.value, status: Menses.status.value, effective: MensesDate }

[Observation: "Menses finding code"] Menses let MensesDate: (Menses.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value with [MedicationAdministration: "tamoxifen code"] Tamoxifen such that ToConcept(Menses.value as FHIR.CodeableConcept) ~ "Menstruation, function (observable entity)" and MensesDate after (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value and MensesDate within 6 years of (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value return Tuple { resourceType: 'Observation', id: Menses.id.value, status: Menses.status.value }

TamoxifenAdditional5Years.label: Tamoxifen Additional 5 Years

action.description: Continue Tamoxifen for an additional 5 years

TamoxifenAdditional5Years.cql: [MedicationAdministration: "tamoxifen code"] Tamoxifen let TamoxifenDate: (Tamoxifen.effective as FHIR.dateTime).value, MensesDate: ("No Menses within 1 Year of Tamoxifen").effective where TamoxifenDate after MensesDate or TamoxifenDate same as MensesDate return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationAdministration', id: Tamoxifen.id.value, status: Tamoxifen.status.value }

AromataseInhibitor5YearsRequest.label: Aromatase Inhibitor 5 Years Request
AromataseInhibitor5YearsRequest.cql: [MedicationRequest: "anastrozole code"] anastrozole return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationRequest', id: anastrozole.id.value , status: anastrozole.status.value}

AromataseInhibitor5Years.label: Aromatase Inhibitor 5 Years
AromataseInhibitor5Years.cql: [MedicationAdministration: "anastrozole code"] anastrozole return Tuple{ resourceType: 'MedicationAdministration', id: anastrozole.id.value , status: anastrozole.status.value}
